external_references.description: KISA. (n.d.). Phishing Target Reconnaissance and Attack Resource Analysis Operation Muzabi. Retrieved March 7, 2022.

description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has checked for the presence of antivirus software with powershell Get-CimInstance -Namespace root/securityCenter2 – classname antivirusproduct.(Citation: KISA Operation Muzabi)
